item.title: [sld] Cloudshredder Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have flying and haste.

item.title: [sld] Crystalline Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

item.title: [sld] Dakkon Blackblade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

item.title: [sld] Hedron Archive
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

item.title: [sld] Harmonic Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment."

item.title: [sld] Hibernation Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."

item.title: [sld] Lavabelly Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life."

item.title: [sld] Syphon Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have lifelink. (Damage dealt by a Sliver creature you control also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [sld] Pilgrim's Eye
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Thopter

Flying

When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Shadowborn Apostle
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.

{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Reliquary Tower
item.description:
Land

You have no maximum hand size.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [sld] Spiteful Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player or planeswalker."

item.title: [sld] Opaline Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Slivers have "Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, you may draw a card."

item.title: [p30a] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [p30a] Sol Ring
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.title: [sld] Peek
item.description:
Instant

Look at target player's hand.

Draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/lil-giri-saves-day-magic-30

item.title: [sld] Greed
item.description:
Enchantment

{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/lil-giri-saves-day-magic-30

item.title: [sld] Curiosity
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/lil-giri-saves-day-magic-30

item.title: [sld] Vandalblast
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact you don't control.

Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/lil-giri-saves-day-magic-30

item.title: [sld] Last Chance
item.description:
Sorcery

Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/lil-giri-saves-day-magic-30

item.title: [plg22] Moraug, Fury of Akoum
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Minotaur Warrior

Each creature you control gets +1/+0 for each time it has attacked this turn.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.

item.title: [plg22] Ox of Agonas
item.description:
Creature — Ox

When Ox of Agonas enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

Escape—{R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

Ox of Agonas escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [plg22] Angrath, the Flame-Chained
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Angrath

+1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.

−3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has mana value 3 or less.

−8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

item.title: [plg22] Tahngarth, First Mate
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Minotaur Warrior

Tahngarth, First Mate can't be blocked by more than one creature.

Whenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.

item.title: [psvc] Ephemerate
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [psvc] Infernal Grasp
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [psvc] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [sld] Horned Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have trample.

item.title: [sld] Two-Headed Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [ha6] Rustvale Bridge
item.description:
Artifact Land

Rustvale Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.

Indestructible

{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

item.title: [sld] Plains
item.description:
Basic Land — Plains

({T}: Add {W}.)

item.title: [sld] Ward Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color.

All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.

item.title: [sld] Brood Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

item.title: [sld] Tempered Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it."

item.title: [sld] Winged Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have flying.

item.title: [prcq] Gideon, Ally of Zendikar
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Gideon

+1: Until end of turn, Gideon, Ally of Zendikar becomes a 5/5 Human Soldier Ally creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

0: Create a 2/2 white Knight Ally creature token.

−4: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+1."

item.title: [prcq] Thraben Inspector
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

https://twitter.com/r_0310/status/1286137686349111296

item.title: [prcq] Selfless Spirit
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Flying

Sacrifice Selfless Spirit: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [ha6] Phyrexian Metamorph
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Shapeshifter

({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

item.title: [ha6] Ophiomancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.

item.title: [ha6] Night of Souls' Betrayal
item.description:
Legendary Enchantment

All creatures get -1/-1.

item.title: [ha6] Laelia, the Blade Reforged
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Warrior

Haste

Whenever Laelia, the Blade Reforged attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from your library and/or your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Laelia.

item.title: [ha6] Glimpse the Unthinkable
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player mills ten cards.

item.title: [ha6] Chalice of the Void
item.description:
Artifact

Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.

Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

item.title: [ha6] Retrofitter Foundry
item.description:
Artifact

{3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry.

{2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

{T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
